text: <@UJL4N3WN8> Thanks for your input. It gives me good information about how things work and best practices that I can provide to those who are requesting this addition to the templates.

Hi All, On August 4th we are introducing new limits on the use of CRM tokens in Programmable email (for new and existing emails).
When you use CRM tokens in these type of emails, you'll be able to send them with the following limits:
up to 100,000 recipients and make one CRM call
or 50,000 recipients and make two CRM calls
or 25,000 recipients and make three CRM calls
or 12,500 recipients and make four CRM calls
or 6,250 recipients and make a max of five CRM calls
Sending an email that meets or exceeds these limits will delay or cancel it.

Please note that:
You can't clone and send programmable emails at the same time as this is an account limit.
A/B testing isn't available for these emails.
Try adding extra_classes=“some_class_name” to the custom module. Can’t remember if this works in email templates.
Has anyone else had a number of programmable emails break? A lot of my emails are now unable to send due to template missing and the styling is not longer present specifically for background images.
